Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Whipple
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, California, and Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Whipple.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, California, and Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Whipple.

Allow extra travel time.
